q: Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of "News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role." He explained on a forthcoming episode of "Oprah Presents Master Class': I asked a very successful guy,` What's the best advice you can give me?' and he said,` Simon Cowell , always know when to leave the fair.' And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever. Despite departing` American Idol', Simon Cowell - who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last year- insists he has enjoyed being a TV talent show judge because it isn"t very difficult.

That it was all a mistake and we should never have gone in? Of course, not. His world-view and sense of self are too long held to ever admit that the invasion of Iraq was a mistake and should never have been launched. And I doubt Mr. Donald Rumsfeld will live long enough to reflect and recant his blunders as Mr. McNamara was brave enough to do.
